---
title: "Warriors Of Chaos"
---

Slow-grow, sixth-edition inspired Warriors of Chaos army.

Currently, this force consists of 16 Chaos Warriors and five knights (wip). 
- The Chaos Warriors were painted in metallics and heavily darkened with contrast washes. 
- The knights were painted black, with dark grey and metallic highlights, as per Koltti's tutorials. 

Current models for this project:
- Three ogres
- Six warhounds
- 25 metal, oldhammer warriors
- Archaon, metal
- Crom, metal
- Chaos sorcerer on steed, Mark of Nurgle, metal
- Exalted champion on daemonic steed, Mark of Khorne, metal
- Two additional knights of chaos
- ~Eight sixth edition warriors of chaos.
